title: Insert the Utility Disk into the disk drive and turrr on the computer
Type the access code <KIE 1887> and press <RETURN>
Choose the disk scores which you want to read from the menu and press <RETURN> when prompted
Select the file for which you want to see the student scores from the menu and press <RETURN> when prompted

note: At this point, the printing operation should stop.
title: If you want to stop the program from listing names and scores, hold down the <CTRL> and the <5> keys at the same time
To resume the printing process, hold down the <CTRL> and <5> keys at the same time
